Uses of Package
gameelements

Packages that use gameelements
ai   
animation   
gameelements   
gui   
network   
player   
 

Classes in gameelements used by ai
GameSituation
          This class holds information about a certain game situation on a game board, like the number and color of game tokens in each field.
Position
          Class for keeping x- and y-coordinates of a field position in one data structure.
 

Classes in gameelements used by animation
Game
          Represents a running game, containing the game board, the game situation, and the two players and manages each turn by asking the current player for its next move and applying it to the game, until the game is stopped or the game is won by one player.
GameColor
          This class represents the two existing colors used for players and game tokens.
GameSituation
          This class holds information about a certain game situation on a game board, like the number and color of game tokens in each field.
Position
          Class for keeping x- and y-coordinates of a field position in one data structure.
 

Classes in gameelements used by gameelements
Game
          Represents a running game, containing the game board, the game situation, and the two players and manages each turn by asking the current player for its next move and applying it to the game, until the game is stopped or the game is won by one player.
GameBoard
          Represents the layout of the game board used during the whole duration of a game.
GameColor
          This class represents the two existing colors used for players and game tokens.
GamePreferences
          This class holds game preferences for the dimension of the board, types and names of the participating players, strategy settings, display options, and setup options for the board.
GameSituation
          This class holds information about a certain game situation on a game board, like the number and color of game tokens in each field.
GameSituation.FieldSetup
          Class that contains properties for setting up a field within a board at initialization, to present a preceded game situation.
IllegalMoveException
          This Exception is thrown, when an illegal move happens.
Position
          Class for keeping x- and y-coordinates of a field position in one data structure.

Game
